sn47.37:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn47.37:1.4: Tassa kāye kāyānupassino viharato yo kāyasmiṁ chando so pahīyati.
sn47.37:2.1: Vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn47.37:2.2: Tassa vedanāsu vedanānupassino viharato yo vedanāsu chando so pahīyati.
sn47.37:3.1: Citte cittānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn47.37:3.2: Tassa citte cittānupassino viharato yo cittamhi chando so pahīyati.
sn47.37:4.1: Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn47.37:4.2: Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato yo dhammesu chando so pahīyati.
